original_title: エロ怖い怪談 第壱之怪 イグアナ女
overview: When out drinking with her friends, Ayaka meets Hiro and they start a relationship. While they get along great and do a lot of sex, they both start receiving threatening text messages and soon discover they are being stalked by a crazy woman who loves iguanas.
title: Erotic Scary Stories Vol.1 - Iguana Woman
